list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Enforce numeric input for phone number fields
This commit updates the 'no_hp' field in 'register.php' form for both user and admin, enforcing a pattern that only allows numeric inputs. By using a regular expression pattern, it ensures the phone numbers entered do not contain spaces or other non-numeric characters.

task.summary:
Update project structure and enhance workspace settings
This commit focuses on rearranging certain PHP files under admin directory, removing the redundant README.md file, and fine-tuning many settings in .idea/workspace.xml. Such updates strive for more standardized development settings and efiicient project structure organization enhancing ease of access and management.

Improve user registration and project organization
This update regroups files for better structure, optimizes workspace settings, and improves user registration functionalities. PHP files in the 'user' directory were thoroughly revised, especially 'register.php', to enhance user registration process. The 'apiwilayah.ts' file is deleted and 'register.ts' is relocated, reflecting an effort for better project organization. Unexpected inputs check is also implemented, ensuring email address validity during registration.

Initialize admin functionalities and refactor user registration
This commit introduces various admin functionalities like login, logout, dashboard, and registration. In addition, the user registration process is improved by using a database configuration file and updating the registration form title. This commit also establishes basic TypeScript-based checks for form fields in the registration process.

Refactor registration process and add user request handling
This commit refactors the registration process, moving data into `userrequests` table and directs the user to a `waitinglist` page. Also added is an admin functionality to handle these user requests, generate QR codes, and download license key. These changes provide a better workflow for user management and enhance system security.

Enforce numeric input for phone number fields
This commit updates the 'no_hp' field in 'register.php' form for both user and admin, enforcing a pattern that only allows numeric inputs. By using a regular expression pattern, it ensures the phone numbers entered do not contain spaces or other non-numeric characters.

MESSAGE.value:
Add new project configuration files
This commit adds new project configuration files for the PHP, PHPUnit, and Discord plugins. It also includes configuration for Git shared settings and directory mappings, in addition to a .gitignore file. These configurations are necessary to standardize development settings and version control guidelines across the team.

Reorganized project structure and updated configuration files
This commit includes shifting update_gizi.php and data_gizi.php into admin folder, deletion of README.md, and changes to numerous configuration settings in .idea/workspace.xml. The changes standardize development settings and better organize the project structure for easier access and management.

Update project structure and enhance workspace settings
This commit focuses on rearranging certain PHP files under admin directory, removing the redundant README.md file, and fine-tuning many settings in .idea/workspace.xml. Such updates strive for more standardized development settings and efiicient project structure organization enhancing ease of access and management.

These changes provide a better workflow for user management and enhance system security.

This commit updates the 'no_hp' field in 'register.php' form for both user and admin, enforcing a pattern that only allows numeric inputs. By using a regular expression pattern, it ensures the phone numbers entered do not contain spaces or other non-numeric characters.
